pull.title: [24.x] Bump version to 24.0rc1
pull.body:
Bump the version to 24.0rc1
Generate the man pages.
Generate the example bitcoin conf file.
Update the version number in bips.md.

comments.body:
In ba570c9d076390a14a175196897ea8aa83cc4a7a "build: Bump version to 24.0rc1"

This should be bumped too

```suggestion
define(_CLIENT_VERSION_RC, 1)
```

Manpages will need to be regenerated to pick up the correct version.
Thanks. I'll also need to regenerate them to pickup a missing option.
